scripts.test:e2e: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True playwright test tests/e2e/story-chat-basico.spec.ts tests/e2e/story-journey-completa.spec.ts tests/e2e/story-persona-switching.spec.ts tests/e2e/story-canvas-interativo.spec.ts tests/e2e/story-upload-conta.spec.ts tests/e2e/story-autenticacao.spec.ts
scripts.test:360: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True pnpm exec playwright test tests/e2e/360-performance.test.ts tests/e2e/360-accessibility.test.ts tests/e2e/360-stress.test.ts tests/e2e/360-integration.test.ts tests/e2e/360-regression.test.ts tests/e2e/360-crossbrowser.test.ts tests/e2e/360-recovery.test.ts tests/e2e/360-visual-regression.test.ts tests/e2e/360-mobile.test.ts tests/e2e/360-load-distributed.test.ts tests/e2e/360-external-services.test.ts
scripts.test:360:basic: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True pnpm exec playwright test tests/e2e/360-basic.test.ts --config=config/playwright/playwright.360.config.ts
scripts.test:360:coverage: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True pnpm exec playwright test tests/e2e/360-coverage.test.ts --config=config/playwright/playwright.360.config.ts
scripts.test:360:advanced: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True pnpm exec playwright test tests/e2e/360-advanced.test.ts --config=config/playwright/playwright.360.config.ts
scripts.test:360:debug: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True pnpm exec playwright test --config=config/playwright/playwright.360.config.ts --headed --debug
scripts.test:360:dev: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True pnpm exec playwright test --config=config/playwright/playwright.dev.config.ts tests/e2e/360-*.test.ts
scripts.test:360:ci: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True pnpm exec playwright test --config=config/playwright/playwright.ci.config.ts tests/e2e/360-*.test.ts
scripts.test:360:regression: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True pnpm exec playwright test --config=config/playwright/playwright.regression.config.ts tests/e2e/360-*.test.ts
scripts.test:360:smoke: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True pnpm exec playwright test --config=config/playwright/playwright.smoke.config.ts tests/e2e/360-basic.test.ts
scripts.test:360:performance: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True pnpm exec playwright test --config=config/playwright/playwright.performance.config.ts tests/e2e/360-advanced.test.ts
scripts.test:360:accessibility: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True pnpm exec playwright test --config=config/playwright/playwright.accessibility.config.ts tests/e2e/360-coverage.test.ts
scripts.test:360:visual: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True pnpm exec playwright test --config=config/playwright/playwright.visual.config.ts tests/e2e/360-coverage.test.ts
scripts.test:360:stress: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True pnpm exec playwright test --config=config/playwright/playwright.stress.config.ts tests/e2e/360-advanced.test.ts
scripts.test:360:crossbrowser: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True pnpm exec playwright test --config=config/playwright/playwright.crossbrowser.config.ts tests/e2e/360-basic.test.ts
scripts.test:360:mobile: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True pnpm exec playwright test --config=config/playwright/playwright.mobile.config.ts tests/e2e/360-basic.test.ts
scripts.test:360:integration: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT=True pnpm exec playwright test --config=config/playwright/playwright.integration.config.ts tests/e2e/360-coverage.test.ts
scripts.test:360:report: export PLAYWRIGHT=True && pnpm exec playwright show-report
